text: Alberto Falcone is a fictional Batman character who is also known as the Holiday Killer. He appears in American comic books published by DC Comics. == Fictional character biography == He is the son of Gotham Mafia leader Carmine Falcone. He is also a mobster, but does not have control over his dad's crime organization. == In other media == Luke Brandon Field portrayed Al Falcone in the DC Extended Universe movie The Flash. He also appeared in the HBO television miniseries The Penguin (2024) set in The Batman shared universe, portrayed by Michael Zegen. Category:Batman characters Category:DC Comics characters
title: Alberto Falcone
